title: Starfield - 14 NEW Details You Need To Know Before You Purchase
description:
Not a lot of developers can do size and scale quite as well as Bethesda Game Studios, and Starfield is taking even that to entirely new heights. The upcoming space-faring RPG is set to be a mind-bogglingly massive experience- which, of course, means that there's no shortage of interesting details about there about the many, many things the game will encapsulate. 

We've already spoken about quite a few of those details here at GamingBolt, but there's still plenty left to talk about. Here, that's exactly what we'll be doing.
